briefTitle: Study of the Sexual Health of Patients Treated for Breast Cancer and Followed up in the Observatory of Fertility at Jeanne de Flandre Hospital.
officialTitle: Study of the Sexual Health of Patients Treated for Non-metastatic Breast Cancer and Followed up in the Observatory of Fertility at Jeanne de Flandre Hospital : a Prospective Monocentric Cohort With Repeated Anonymous Self-administered Questionnaires.
conditions: Breast Cancer, Breast Neoplasms, Breast Carcinoma, Breast Tumor
primaryOutcomeMeasure: variation of score FSFI (female sexual function index)
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Female from 18 years
* In a relationship with a man or a woman
* Developing invasive carcinoma of breast cancer
* Planned medical therapy project by chemotherapy
* Followed up in the Observatory of fertility
* Patient who gave written consent to participate in the study
* Insured Social Patient
* Patient willing to follow all study procedures and duration

Exclusion Criteria:

-
